text:
maq indra#Sca mE dhAqtA ca# maq indra#Sca mEq 
viShNu#Sca maq indra#Sca mEq &Svinau# ca maq indra#Sca mE 
maqruta#Sca maq indra#Sca mEq viSvE# ca mE dEqvA indra#Sca mE 	
pRuthiqvI ca# maq indra#Sca mEq&ntari#kShaM ca maq indra#Sca mEq 
dyauSca# maq ( ) indra#Sca mEq diSa#Sca maq indra#Sca mE 		
mUqrddhA ca# maq indra#Sca mE praqjApa#tiSca maq indra#Sca mE || 12 
(tvaShTA# caq - dyauSca# maq - Eka#vi(gm)SatiSca) (A6)
